title: Vase
provenance: Arte Vetraria Muranese, thence to Evan Lobel.
description: Slightly undualting, attenuated form; bulge near base; tilted, flared mouth. Thick body composed of a loose pattern of alternating, roughly rectangular fields of opaque white and transparent multi-colored glass.
name: Vase
